docTitle.titlePart:
Octadecyl immobilized H-ZSM-5-catalyzed
ring-openings of epoxides with water in liquid phase
accompanying shape-selective property

byline.affiliation: Department of Chemistry, Tokyo Gakugei University,
The Institute of Physical and Chemical Research (RIKEN),

front.div:
The octadecyltrichlorosilane-treated ZSM-5 catalyst H-ZSM-5-C18 exhibited high activity
in the ring-opening reaction of epoxides in a toluene-water solvent. The shape-selective
property of H-ZSM-5-C18 in the liquid phase has also been observed by comparing the
reaction rates with those over octadecyltrichlorosilane treated SiO2-AlzO 3.
front.keyword:
Keywords: ZSM-5; alkylsilane treatment; shape-selective property; ring-opening reaction;
epoxide
